translations: contr.必须，不得不（got to 的非规范发音书写形式）

sentences.sentence: Prices are high and our kids gotta eat.
sentences.translation: 物价很高而我们的孩子们又必须吃饭。

sentences.sentence: When someone tells you that you have to give a speech, your response may be "I gotta do what?"
sentences.translation: 如果有人跟你说你必须做一个演讲，你的回答可能是“我必须做什么？”

sentences.sentence: In other words, you gotta stretch yourself, get uncomfortable and get out of your comfort zone, and then keep getting out.
sentences.translation: 换句话说，你必须伸展你自己，变得不舒服，离开你的舒适区，然后继续往外走。
